meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of lochia
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the lochial discharge is a normal part of the postpartum period.
meanings.sent2: The nurse monitored the lochial flow to ensure the new mother's recovery was progressing well.
meanings.sent3: The lochial odor was not pleasant, but it was a sign that the body was healing.
meanings.sent4: Her lochial bleeding was like a river of renewal after giving birth.
meanings.sent5: The lochial color changed over time, indicating the body's healing process.

meanings.definition: pertaining to the discharge of blood, mucus, and tissue from the uterus after childbirth
meanings.sent1: The lochial discharge gradually decreased as the woman recovered from childbirth.
meanings.sent2: The nurse provided instructions on how to manage the lochial flow at home.
meanings.sent3: The lochial stains on the bedsheets were a reminder of the recent delivery.
meanings.sent4: Her lochial bleeding was a natural part of the postpartum healing process.
meanings.sent5: The lochial discharge was a mix of different substances, showing the body's recovery journey.
